page.title: 13Tal_y_Bont Village
page.content: Many of the houses in the estate were for sale. People are moving out of Tal_y_Bont for several reasons. Recently there has been a lot of construction work,e.g. on the new by_pass which passes the city of Bangor. The hospital in Penrhos Garnedd which serves the whole of Gwynedd was completed in 1984. The Hydro Electric Power Station near Llanberis, which is now completed, was officially opened by HRH Prince Charles in 1984. The people are now leaving the area for places like Scotland looking for work.
